item.title: Industry Giant 4.0
item.description:
Title: Industry Giant 4.0
Genre: Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Don VS Dodo
Publisher: Toplitz Productions
Franchise: Toplitz Productions
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game



Are you the next Rockefeller, Jobs or Bezos? Put your business acumen to the test as you embark on a journey to economic dominance with Industry Giant 4.0, where you shape an industrial empire from the ground up. This immersive simulation goes beyond mere construction, offering a comprehensive experience in producing goods, building up logistics, industrial building, production planning, and financial management. As a visionary industrial tycoon, you confront the challenges of a dynamic business landscape influenced by global events, environmental regulations, and technological breakthroughs.





Industry Giant 4.0 starts in the 1950’s and embodies the fourth industrial revolution, Industry 4.0, marked by digitization and networked value chains. Experience the progression and evolution to automation and digitization. Engage in strategic decision-making across the value chain, enhancing productivity, flexibility,innovation, and resource efficiency.





In this game, the ripple effects of world events, climate regulations, and economic crises create a thrilling business dynamic, challenging players to adapt and thrive in an ever-changing environment. Are you ready to build, innovate, and conquer the industrial world? Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit and become one of the greatest industrial magnates of all time in Industry Giant 4.0.




25 different industries including mines, farms, manufacturing and more than 70 goods (raw materials, intermediate products, end products) to manage.


Utilize data in various tables and charts, monitor the flow of goods, as well as the condition and efficiencies of factories, stores and warehouses to resolve production issues and implement appropriate optimizations.


Various city buildings and many stores in different sizes over several time periods and categories (food, fashion, home decoration/furniture, hardware store, electronics).


Transport goods using trucks, trains and ships. Build roads and railways and set up timetables to specify the quantity of goods to be transported in a certain period of time.


Seasons influence the production of certain raw materials, e.g. food and impact the consumption and purchasing behavior of customers depending on the time of year.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700k or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480, 8GB or Intel Arc A380, 6GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Low 1080p @ 30 FPS
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K or AMD Ryzen 7 5700X
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, 12GB or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT, 12GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: High 1080p @ 60 FPS

item.title: Great God Grove
item.description:
Title: Great God Grove
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: LimboLane
Publisher: LimboLane , Fellow Traveller
Franchise: Great God Grove
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game



Once in a generation, the gods come together to postpone the apocalypse. But this time, the god of communication started a bunch of godly fights and then went awol. With the sky splitting and the gods in disarray, who's gonna join the Bizzyboys to help SAVE DA WORLD FROM A-POCKY-LIPS???


As the gods’ mail-carrier, suck up and launch speech bubbles to solve puzzles.




Deliver messages to chat, flirt, or hurt their feelings.




The god of TEAMWORK? The god of LOVE SONGS? Drain it, who’s in charge around here…?

You may be ready for:

  • A big colorful world to explore
  • Third and first-person gameplay
  • Weird people. Weirder gods

But are you also ready for:

  • Godly crushes?
  • Pumpkin fights??
  • Puppets cooking???

AND YOU’RE NOT READY FOR:

  • Grovekeeping!
  • Godbossing!!
  • THE END OF THE WORLD AS WE KNOW IT!!!!!





LimboLane is a creative duo making silly games that squish and bounce, comprised of designer Day Lane and animator Yugo Limbo. They have a love for the kitschy, the surreal, and the utterly bizarre. Their nod-and-shake adventure game Smile For Me was self-published on Steam in 2019 and re-released for consoles in 2023.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 +
    • Processor: x64 architecture
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Tricky Madness
item.description:
Title: Tricky Madness
Genre: Racing , Simulation , Sports , Early Access
Developer: Nathan Dearth
Publisher: Nathan Dearth
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game

Tricky Madness is an upcoming arcade snowboarding game with a focus on speed and big air inspired by classics like SSX and 1080.

Build up boost levels by scoring points while from tricks and grinding. Upon landing, unleash a powerful boost for a limited time based on the level you've built. Frequent tricking is the key to enhancing your speed for a thrilling ride!

Build up your Freaky meter with spins, flips, grabs, and grinds then perform Wicked Tricks and Wicked Grinds to really score big.

The Superman, The Worm, and The Butt Slide Grind are some of the many Wicked Tricks you can unleash as you style on the slopes.

Chain tricks together to score more points based on the number of tricks you performed in a combo. Extra points earned form combos are held in a separate counter and are cashed in when you stop the combo or completely lost if you wipeout, manage this risk-reward element is key to mastering the game.

  • 8 handcrafted levels each with their own hidden surprises and unique experiences

  • A dedicated campaign mode set on an open-world mountain with secrets and collectibles.

  • 8 fully voiced characters with their own backstory, personality and visual style.

  • A voiced in-game DJ commentator hyping you up your moves.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

Linux

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR -=Dank Dreams and Goated Memes=- [#wow/11 Like and Subscribe] Poggerz Edition
item.description:
Title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR -=Dank Dreams and Goated Memes=- [#wow/11 Like and Subscribe] Poggerz Edition
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Normal Wholesome Games
Publisher: Normal Wholesome Games
Release Date: Nov 14, 2024




About This Game

The illuminati have stolen all the world’s memes! You’re an ex secret-service agent turned to a peaceful life of painting, but now you’re needed one more time to fight back. lets be real its an FPS game that's a sequel to the original you know exactly what to expect why are u still reading this don't let ur memes be dreams

featuring a state of da art creamy meme slider to adjust ur meme levels to your liking. this took a team of 483 developers 7 years to build making this now a AAAAA game get rekt scrubs

Many gr9 moments:

  • 13 levels of neuron-obliterating fun!

  • High-security prison outbreak where you’ll stop along the way to do some laundry

  • Speed your convertible through zombie-infested streets because yes you’re a badass but you’re also late for work

  • Blow up a helicopter

  • Infiltrate Area 51 to stop a world-threatening event planned by the Illuminati

  • … aliens

  • And more!!!1!!

Headshot with your favs:

  • shitty pistol

  • big D ;)

  • goated shotty (only if ur cool)

  • awwwp uwu

  • rip rocket

  • Throwable spliff aka doobie aka joint aka blunt

  • Gun that shoots farts (becuz f*** it why not)

  • AND MORE!!!!

420BLAZEIT 2 features a healthy amount of IMAGINARY “consumables” that grant you cool powers so you can truly 420 BLAZE IT 360 NO SCOPE IT like an EPICC GAMER(™). 13 levels x 27 weapons x sherk + dhomas the dank engine = 420% BIGGER AND BETTER than the original!!1!

“This game changed my entire life before it i had a respectable job and family now im a leet gamer gettin 480 headshoots no scope blaze it every day. 10/10” - this could be u!!!

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

420BLAZEIT 2 contains violence and drug usage. It’s not appropriate for young audiences.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-4670 / AMD FX4350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GT1030 / Radeon RX550
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 16 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 720p Low-Med Settings, Producing 40+ FPS
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD 2700x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce 2060 / Radeon RX5700
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 16 GB available space

item.title: Space Trash Scavenger
item.description:
Title: Space Trash Scavenger
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Simulation
Developer: SquarePlay Games
Publisher: Paradox Arc
Franchise: Paradox Arc
Release Date: Nov 14, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 9, 2023




About This Game

In the 31st century, Space Trash Scavengers roam the cosmos, risking their lives for riches amongst the debris of an ancient war.

Build your Space Rig–a 3D raft with artificial gravity, power, trash processing, farming and defense. Craft the everyday food, fuel, weapons, ammo and space suit upgrades you’ll need to survive out here in the vastness of the cosmos. Automate your factory, using conveyor pads to deliver ingredients between your machines.

In space there is no up or down! Expand your base in any direction for the most efficient layout. Once you are equipped with the necessary fuel and a warp drive, you’ll be free to explore other sectors and continue your mission.

Circumnavigate tiny asteroids, fly between abandoned outposts, and board derelict spaceships as they orbit the system. Take caution, however, and remember to keep your jetpack fuel topped up–you’ll need it to get back to your Space Rig safe and sound!

Each salvage zone is a procedurally generated, dynamic, and ever-changing open world.

You are an employee for the galaxy’s number one waste disposal firm, stranded far away from home with a mission to clean the galaxy from the remains of a galactic war. Space trash is your main resource. Whether it is salvaged debris floating in space, advanced and rare tech from wrecked ships, or scavenged goods from asteroid surfaces, you’ll want to snatch it all up!

Recycle and refine it to produce valuable goods that will net a tidy sum on the Trash Exchange, and spend it to upgrade your kit. Use conveyor pads, splitters and more to automate as much or as little of the process as you want.

You’re not alone amid the wreckage. Alien bots patrol most sectors of space nowadays and they’ll be drawn to you as your operation expands.

You’ll need a steady aim, impeccable defenses, and an upgraded armory to protect your Space Rig from the dangers of these foes. Survival depends on your ability to defend yourself!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
    • Graphics: Desktop Nvidia GTX 1050 4GB or equivalent (integrated GPUs/lower spec mobile laptop GPUs not supported)
    Recommended:
    • Processor: Desktop Intel Core i9 or equivalent
    • Graphics: Desktop Nvidia 2070 8GB or equivalent
